page.title: 07Employment in Alford
page.content: Many adults work out-side the area some in oil-related jobs. Most school leavers have to look for work elsewhere. Unemployment is not the scourge it is in other areas.Some youngsters are employed locally on Youth Training Schemes and the Manpower Services Commission provides a part-time ranger and a labouring squad for projects in the Country Park Farming no longer uses a large work force and though tourism is growing there are few full time jobs,many being seasonal and part-time.Local jobs are in farming,small private businesses,the golf course,ambulance and bus depots,the transport museum The local authority provides jobs at Tullynessle school,sheltered housing the Country park,water and fire services and the roads department.
